items.sentence: I don't plan on doing that when Tom is around.
I didn't know you were planning on doing that.
Do you want to know when Tom plans to do that?
You should ask Tom to tell you how to do that.
You should ask Tom to show you how to do that.
Would you have done that the same way Tom did?
Tom asked Mary why she didn't need to do that.
Tom asked Mary why she didn't like doing that.
Tom asked Mary if she wanted to do that today.
Tom asked Mary if she needed to do that today.
